metadata.dc:title: Documento de consenso SECPAL-semFYC. Atención al paciente con cáncer en fase terminal en el domicilio.

[Consensus document of the Spanish Society of Palliative Care (SECPAL) and the Spanish Society of Family and Community Medicine (semFYC). Domiciliary care for the patient with cancer in terminal phase].
